issue.title: [CF 340] Check Activation Border
issue.body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1.  Ret Pally Exorcism spell is always available.  However, I only want to cast it when instant and yellow activation border lights up.
2.  Exorcism is setup as a reactive ability with Check Activation Border checked, and Show Icon when Usable checked.
3.  Icon shows all the time, not just when Activation border is highlighted.

What do you expect to happen? What happens instead?
Icon to only show when activaiton border is highlighted.  (Note:  I'm brand new to TellMeWhen, so I might not be setting this up right!)

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)
4.6.5

Do you have an error log of what happened?
N/A

Please provide any additional information below (including any export strings if applicable; see above.)
^1^T^SType^Sreactive ^SConditions^T ^N1^T ^SType^SCOMBAT ^t^Sn^N1 ^t^SEnabled^B ^SName^SExorcism ^SUseActvtnOverlay^B ^t^N46502^S~` ^Sicon^^


> Posted by CurseForge user TechieFan | Imported from CurseForge issue #340 | Raw

comments.body:
The "Check Activation Border" setting only forces the icon to be treated as usable when the border appears. If the border is not shown, then the ability will go by normal usability checks to determine if it is usable or not.

If you only want the icon to show when Exorcism is instant (i.e. The Art of War is active), add a "Buff - Duration" conditions to the icon, checking that the duration of the buff "The Art of War" is greater than (>) 0.

The new export string:

^1^T^SType^Sreactive ^SConditions^T ^N1^T ^SType^SCOMBAT ^t^N2^T ^SType^SBUFFDUR ^SOperator^S> ^SName^SThe~`Art~`of~`War ^t^Sn^N2 ^t^SEnabled^B ^SName^SExorcism ^SUseActvtnOverlay^B ^t^N46608^S~`~| ^Sicon^^


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
